experience.title: Product Intern
experience.description: During my internship at Optum, I conducted secondary research and analyzed market trends to map customer journeys and behavior. I identified multiple touchpoints in the customer journey and recommended a three-pronged strategy to optimize customer experience. Additionally, I built an ML classification model to analyze 10,000 customer verbatim, achieving an 82% accuracy rate. These research insights culminated in seven innovative recommendations to transform the future of contact centers.
